p: Peritoneal cells used in in vitro tests were obtained from BALB/c mice aged eight weeks. The animals were obtained from the central animal facility of the Center for Biological and Health Sciences (CCBS) of the Federal University of Mato Grosso do Sul (UFMS, Brazil) in good health and free of infections or parasites common to rodents, maintained in individually ventilated cages equipped with mini-isolators, fed a balanced feed (Nuvilab CR-1, Nuvital) with free access to water.
